name: Skipping Turtles - OUYA, iOS, and Android Game Down Under
blurb: Skippy the famous skipping turtle has returned from retirement to battle Salty, the maniacal salt water crocodile. OUYA, iOS, Android

rewards.reward: THANK YOU FROM SKIPPY - Skippy will send you a personal email thanking you for supporting him and receive a code for a free download of Skipping Turtles. You will also become a member of Skippy Nation.

FREE GAME CODE AND FAME - Receive a code for a free download of Skipping Turtles, become a member of Skippy Nation, receive a thank you email from Skippy, and have your name included in the game credits. Skippy Salutes you!

SKIPPING TURTLES STICKER - You will receive all of the previous rewards as well as receive a limited edition Skipping Turtles sticker to place proudly for all to view and your name in our game credits. (International shipping please add $10)

GAME PRINT AND COPY OF GAME - You will receive a print of our game in high resolution and a free download as well as become a part of Skippy Nation, name in game credits, and sticker.  (International backers we can email you the file or pay $15 for shipping)

LIMITED EDITION SKIPPY SHIRT - These shirts will be exclusive to Kickstarter backers. You will also receive a personal thank you email from Skippy, included in our game credits, your name in our game credits, and receive a free game code. (International shipping please add $15)

WAKE UP WITH SKIPPY - you will receive the Skippy Coffee Mug to proudly display as you are trying to awaken from a night of playing Skipping Turtles. You will also receive the t-shirt, sticker, thank you from Skippy, your name in the game credits, and code to download the game. (International shipping please add $20

SKIPPY'S WALL OF FAME! - Here is your chance to become a permanent part of Skipping Turtles game like never before.  Skippy has 6 spots on his wall to proudly display a photo of his backers.  Skippy's Wall of Fame will be in the credits of Skipping Turtles.  You can use any image as long as it is appropriate and your name on the photo as well.  You will also receive a Skipping Turtles shirt and free game download.

SKIPPY'S EXCLUSIVE PROMOTER - Remember the days of Don King promoting Mike Tyson?  Become Skippy's Exclusive Promoter.  Don't worry he won't bite anyone's ear off.  You will get a certificate, featured on our website and appear in our game's credits.  Also receive 3 free downloads of our game.  This is a ONE of a kind reward.  "Don ain't got nothin on you!"

A BILLBOARD OF YOU IN OUR GAME! - That's right for only $200 we will place your name, company name, photo of you or company logo in our game on a billboard.  So every time you play you will see it.  You will also receive a shirt, copy of Skipping Turtles, and name in our credits.  Limited number available.  (International pay $15 for shipping)

CHARACTER NAMED AFTER YOU! We have decided to add another since the other was taken so quickly.  For this reward you can give Salty's right hand villain any name you want, as long as it isn't vulgar and this character will be featured in our game. (Image of character is in story)  You will also receive a backer's shirt, sticker, and free download of our game. What will Salty's right hand villain be named??? (International Shipping add $25)

CHARACTER NAMED AFTER YOU!  This is an exclusive reward given to only 1 person.  Skippy's little cousin has arrived and he/she needs a name.  For this reward you can give Skippy's cousin any name you want, as long as it isn't vulgar and his cousin will be featured in our game.  You will also receive a backer's shirt, sticker, and free download of our game.  We are excited to see what his/her name will be.  (International Shipping add $25)

SKIPPY'S ULTIMATE PROMO PACKAGE! - For this reward we will design a unique character/avatar and it will be included in the beginning of the game intro. You will also receive a backer's shirt, 10 Skipping Turtles stickers, download of our game, and game print signed by our creator.  (International shipping included)

AUTHENTIC AUSTRALIAN DIDGERIDOO - One of a kind Didgeridoo from Australia, Custom crafted by ABORIGINES. Skippy falls asleep each night listening to the music from the didgeridoo. You will also receive a SKIPPING TURTLES iPad/iPhone case and receive your name in our game credits as Skippy's Preferred Backer and a code to download Skipping Turtles. (International shipping please add $25)

KING OF ALL REWARDS!!  We are offering 1 backer the opportunity to choose which animal organization(s) we donate a portion of our sales to for ONE YEAR!  We will notify the organization to let them know and set everything up.  You will also receive 10 game downloads, 4 backers shirts, 4 Skipping Turtles coffee mugs, 2 Skipping Turtles iPhone/iPad cases, Skippy Bobble Head, 10 Skipping Turtles Stickers, and a permanent place in our game and website as our Elite Backer acknowledging your backing and the organizations you chose to support. (We pay all shipping costs anywhere in the world that can receive packages from USA)
